content:
Tom's Urban is a fantastic spot for burgers and a fun atmosphere.

And yes, you mentioned earlier that you watched the College Football National Championship game with your family and had a great time cheering on Georgia with your dad! It's always exciting to watch sports with family and friends, especially when it's a close game like that. I'm sure the atmosphere at your house was electric!

Enjoy your burgers and beers at Tom's Urban, and I hope the Lakers game is just as thrilling! Let me know if you need any more recommendations or have any other questions.
